title: Project Skin Ezreal?

replies.body:
*Cough* Pulsefire sucks *Cough Cough*

Sorry, I just never liked the way it looked, hence why I keep to the tried and true Explorer Ezreal.

Why do you still use explorer, when you can use _chrome_.

https://s-media-cache-ak0.pinimg.com/564x/ec/9f/55/ec9f55fa9e51bc99e9a64747a3b65b21.jpg

EDIT: Gah, stupid image isn't showing up.

I am not a big fan of chrome Rammus.  I use full metal.  However my skin pref clearly has no connection to browser pref as I love the foxfire Ahri skin but can't stand using mozilla firefox.  

Joke.
Me.
.
.
.
.
.
This Thread.

You mean like this? (Might take a little bit to load) [https://www.facebook.com/FiftyShadesofLeague/photos/ms.c.eJw1y8kNgEAMA8COkJ3LTv~_NIRb4jjT02nQlMqsVF73O7nGKReMD9AhlRL8QyUG6sHsgIripUMcPwAhD6C3kWoKIrQfUpgPVjsyLtjATVa5k1A~;ggdIHvT7QuAHfcyXv.bps.a.1495283484021404.1073741827.1449333158616437/1898220067061075/?type=3&theater]

Until Riot embraces the bow that Ezreal creates with his gauntlet, this skin will sadly have to remain a fiction.

And plus we have Pulsefire (which is his futuristic skin).

And plus that looks a helluva lot like PROJECT: Ashe.
I'd have to see it. Pulsefire still op
